physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Normal physical examination except for blood pressure, height, weight, and BMI as recorded.

physical_examinations.date: Day 3 of the patient's menstrual cycle (23 days after initial examination)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Ultrasound-guided antral follicle count revealed multiple follicles (up to 15 mm) in each ovary and normal ovarian volume.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No changes recorded from previous examination.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Endometrial biopsy revealed weakly proliferative endometrium with multiple compact, nonnecrotizing granulomas. No polarizing material was present.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The first endometrial biopsy showed only proliferative endometrium, while the follow-up biopsy showed a well-formed granuloma.
